title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same features as Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem to chat, stream, and manage Ollama models from Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced command-line wrapper with interactive REPL, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion server for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team; use local models for RAG pipelines and agents.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Curated recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function-calling, fine-tuning, and edge deployment.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local LLMs via Ollama inside Slack threads.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) plus Compose examples for dev and prod.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama builds on macOS and Linux with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate providing typed APIs for chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package to run and chat with Ollama models on desktop and mobile.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library generated from OpenAPI spec; chat, pull, delete, list models.

title: r/ollama - Local LLM community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, tweaks, integrations, and troubleshooting Ollama.
